questions.text: When faced with a complex decision, my first instinct is to...
questions.lowLabel: Trust my gut and act quickly
questions.highLabel: Gather as much data as possible

questions.text: In a team debate, I focus primarily on...
questions.lowLabel: The emotional resonance of the idea
I have complete freedom to define my workflow
questions.highLabel: I have a clear framework and set of guidelines

questions.text: Ambiguity in a project is something I...
questions.lowLabel: Thrive on and use as an opportunity
questions.highLabel: Try to eliminate through immediate planning

questions.text: Strict deadlines and detailed reports are...
If I have mastered a task, I prefer to...
questions.highLabel: Move on to something new and difficult

questions.text: Feedback that highlights areas for growth is...
questions.lowLabel: Sometimes stressful if not balanced with praise
questions.highLabel: The most valuable part of any review

questions.text: When tackling a difficult problem, I usually...
questions.lowLabel: Work it out alone before sharing

questions.text: Success for me is defined by...
questions.highLabel: The collective impact of my group

questions.text: Managing interpersonal conflicts at work is...
questions.lowLabel: Something I prefer others to handle
questions.highLabel: An essential part of driving progress
